resources.string: I\'m so afraid of flying that\nif you throw me in the air,
A face showing expressions in reaction to being thrown

Did I mention I don\'t like flying?
I think I\'m gonna be sick.
This is why I call myself a down-to-earth kind of guy.
I\'m getting too old for this
My life just flashed before my eyes… That was boring.
Free as a bird; It\'s not the next best thing to be.
Breathe in, breathe out. Breathe in, breathe out…
Hey, I can see my house from up there!
Don\'t throw me, I can tap dance!
I should be getting some frequent flyer miles for this!
Did I mention how nice your hair looks today?
I intend to write a strongly worder letter to… to someone!
Good thing I wore my brown pants today
Does this make me an Eagle scout?
Does my face look green to you?
